title: Chats in Google Messages are about to get even more secure
description: Beta users of Google Messages on Android will get end-to-end encryption for group chats in the next few weeks.

title: I asked ChatGPT to write about itself in my style, so I didn’t have to
description: OpenAI's impressive language model can instantly write in almost any style, including mine

title: You might soon get to see Netflix movies and shows before everyone else
description: According to a report, Netflix is inviting tens of thousands of extra people to give early feedback on new content.

title: Asus Zenfone 10: what we want to see
description: The Asus Zenfone 10 could be one of the best small phones, provide it does justice to the current Zenfone 9.
